alert.note: Alert for Elk (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:20AM CDT until May 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ELK...EASTERN BUTLER AND SOUTHERN GREENWOOD COUNTIES... At 920 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles east of Leon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Severy, Latham, Rosalia, Cassoday, Climax, Eureka City Lake, Beaumont, Eureka Airport, Piedmont, El Dorado State Park and El Dorado Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
